description: Impose a +4K warming pattern anomaly to the sstPi SST.  The SST pattern anomaly is derived from years 91-140 of the model's own abrupt4xCO2 experiment, with respect to the piControl, and scaled to have a global mean increase of 4K. The SST pattern anomaly is to be expressed as seasonally varying monthly means.
name: sstPi SIC plus patterned 4K derived from 4xCO2 monthly varying SST anomalies
longName: sstPi sea ice concentration for patterned 4K SST increase derived from the 4xCO2 monthly varying sea surface temperature anomalies.
keywords: sea ice concentration, SIC, patterned SST warming, sstPi,  4K, 4xCO2, seasonally varying monthly means.
